title: Commentary on Pageau's Convo with Don Hoffman, plus my thoughts on Jordan Peterson - Daily Wire
description: I love Pageau's convo with Hoffman. Really addresses Corner Concerns in so many ways. My amateur attempt to be PVK, which can only get better haha
